## Bug Ready Checklist:
 - [ ]  Defined with steps to reproduce
 - [ ]  Defined with acceptance criteria

## Bug Done Checklist:
 - [ ]  Builds without errors
 - [ ]  Unit tests passing
 - [ ]  Deployed on test environment
 - [ ]  QA performed & issues resolved
